articles.title: Greetings to Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Greetings to Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Raul Castro Ruz, Second Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, President of the Council of State and President of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The message said:
					
					 We, on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government and people, extend warm congratulations and comradely greetings to you and, through you, to the Communist Party of Cuba and the Cuban government and people on the 50th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					
					 Over the last 50 years after the victory of the Cuban revolution the fraternal Cuban people, under the correct leadership of respected Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz and you, have honorably defended the sovereignty of the country from the imperialists' sanctions and blockade and their moves to isolate and stifle Cuba and made great progress in the efforts to develop education, public health and economy and improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 The Korean people are sincerely rejoiced as over their own over all the achievements made by the fraternal Cuban people in the revolution and construction and will extend firm support and solidarity to the Cuban people in their just cause to defend the sovereignty of the country and the gains of the revolution in the future, too.
					
					 We take this opportunity to express the belief that the traditional comradely relations of friendship and cooperation between the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries will steadily develop in the joint struggle for socialism against imperialism and heartily wish you and your people greater successes in their work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a floral basket to the Cuban embassy here on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to Cuban Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano on Wednesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Congratulations to Cuban Embassy
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Ministries and national institution of the DPRK sent floral baskets to the Cuban embassy here on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The baskets in the name of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Foreign Trade and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries were conveyed to Cuban Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano on Wednesday.

articles.title: Israel's Air Raids on Palestine Assailed
articles.content:
Israel's Air Raids on Palestine Assailed
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday as regards Israel's recent large-scale military attack on Palestine:
					 On Dec. 27 Israel mobilized more than 60 fighters and gunship to launch barbaric air raids on Gaza Strip of Palestine, thus leaving more than 900 peaceable citizens dead and wounded and a large number of public buildings and houses destroyed.
					
					 The DPRK resolutely denounces Israel's killing of unarmed civilians as a crime against humanity, a serious provocation against the Palestinians and other Arab people and an open challenge to the Mid-east peace process.
					
					 Israel should immediately stop all military actions and positively respond to the demand of the Arab and other peoples of the world for the comprehensive and fair solution to the Mid-east issue.

articles.title: Greetings to Chief of Palestinian National Authority
articles.content:
Greetings to Chief of Palestinian National Authority
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mahmoud Abbas, Chief of the Palestinian National Authority, who is chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization on Dec. 31 on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of the start of the revolution in Palestine. 
					 Expressing the belief that an independent state of Palestine with Kuds as its capital would be surely built, the message wholeheartedly wished the friendly Palestinian people greater success in their efforts to accomplish the cause to retake legitimate national rights.

articles.title: Greetings to Sudanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Sudanese President
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Omar Hassan Ahmed AlÔºçBashir on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of independence of his country. 
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Sudan would grow stronger, the message wholeheartedly wished the Sudanese president greater success in his work for the stability, territorial integrity and development of his country.

articles.title: Congratulations to Lithuanian PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Lithuanian PM
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Kim Yong Il Monday sent a congratulatory message to Andrius Kubilius upon his appointment as Lithuanian Prime Minister.
					 The message sincerely wished the prime minister success in his work for the prosperity of the country and well-being of the people.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Lithuanian FM
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Lithuanian FM
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a congratulatory message to Vygaudas Usackas upon his appointment as foreign minister of the Republic of Lithuania.  
					 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger through the cooperation between the two foreign ministries, the message wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Greetings to Thai Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Thai Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun on Dec. 29 sent a congratulatory message to Kasit Piromya upon his appointment as foreign minister of Thailand.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished him success in the performance of his new job.

articles.title: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a birthday spread to Choe Kyong Ok, a female centenarian residing in Unryul County, South Hwanghae Province.
					 Born into a farm servant's family, Choe had to suffer every kind of humiliation and insult during the past dark days of national ruin. It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a life worthy of human being.
					
					 She worked hard to contribute to increasing the grain production with the will to repay the benefit of the socialist fatherland. Even after being retired, she did not stop working.
					
					 She is now in good health as she is leading an optimistic life while having balanced diet.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the Military Attaches Corps here on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					 The basket and the letter were conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Dau Xuan Long, Vietnamese military attache who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, an anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr of China, on Tuesday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					 Written on the ribbon of the basket are letters reading "We heartily wish the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il good health."

articles.title: Phyongsong Martyrs Cemetery Completed
articles.content:
Phyongsong Martyrs Cemetery Completed
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Phyongsong Martyrs Cemetery was completed in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province.
					 Remains of officials and working people who performed distinguished feats by faithfully working for the Party and the revolution, the country and the people to the last moments of their lives were buried and gravestones having stone pictures on them were set up in the cemetery. 
					
					 Among them are Pak Il Pha, anti-Japanese patriotic martyr, Ri Po Bu, former farmer of Kaechon County, South Phyongan Province, Pak Yong Hun, former chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Rural Economy Management Committee, Labor Hero Dr. Song In Gil, former chief engineer of the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, and Twice Labor Hero O Myong Su, former head of a high speed tunneling work team of the Electric Car Pit of the Tokchon Coal Mine. 
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the cemetery took place on Dec. 30.
					
					 Present there were Ri Thae Nam, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, working people, builders and bereaved families.
					
					 Ri Thae Nam made a speech at the ceremony.

articles.title: Winter Sports Event Contest of 11th National Games Held
articles.content:
Winter Sports Event Contest of 11th National Games Held
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The winter sports event contest of the 11th National Games was held in Pyongyang, Samjiyon and Pujon.
					 It was divided into the group of sports persons and the group of players from among working people.
					
					 Men players of the Pyongyang City Winter Sports Group and women players of the Jagang Provincial Sports Group came first in ice hockey in the group of sports persons and men players of the South Hamgyong Provincial Sports Group and women players of the Pyongyang City Winter Sports Group in speed skating and men and women players of the Paekmasan Sports Group in short track speed skating.
					
					 Players of the Sports Group of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau placed first in men and women's single and pair figure skating while players of the Pyongyang City Winter Sports Group took the first place in ice dancing and players of the Sobaeksu Sports Group in men's and women's fixed-distance skiing and men's alpine skiing and those of the North Hamgyong Provincial Sports Group in women's alpine skiing.
					
					 Players of Ryanggang Province gained good results in speed skating and ski races in the group of players from among working people, thus coming first in team standing.

articles.title: DPRK Art Troupe Gives Performances in Vietnam
articles.content:
DPRK Art Troupe Gives Performances in Vietnam
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Art Troupe toured Vietnam on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to this country. During the visit, the troupe gave performances before full house at a grand theater and an army theater in Hanoi and the August Theater in Hai Phong City from Dec. 17 to 22.
					 Put on the stage were male solo "Our Leader," female solo "Song Devoted to Comrade
						Kim Jong Il," dance "Tondollari," female duet "A Bellflower," a Vietnamese song "Vietnam, My Native Home" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 Appreciating the performances were working people from different strata in Vietnam and foreigners staying there.
					
					 The Vietnamese minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism said that the performances given by the Pyongyang Art Troupe this year marking the 50th anniversary of Kim Il Sung's visit to Vietnam and the 60th birthday of the DPRK were of weighty significance. And he expressed the will to contribute to further developing the cultural exchange between the two countries.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Korean Revolution Museum
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Korean Revolution Museum
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- More than 370,000 servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people from all walks of life and school youth and children have visited the Korean Revolution Museum this year, which systematically and comprehensively showcases the immortal revolutionary history of the peerlessly great persons and exploits performed by them in the nation-building.
					 Visitors from many units such as Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Political University, the Ministry of Agriculture, the Korean Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission and the Academy of Medical Science looked round with deep emotion the rooms devoted to the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea and the nation.
					
					 They paused for a long while before the relics proving that the stirring reality in which the whole country is dashing ahead like the wind to fling open the gate of a great prosperous powerful nation is possible only thanks to the wise leadership provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il to defend Korean-style socialism and arouse the whole party and army and all people to the building of a rich and powerful country, making an endless journey of devoted service under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Morale of Supporting Army and Helping People Prevalent in DPRK
articles.content:
Morale of Supporting Army and Helping People Prevalent in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The morale of the people supporting the army and vice versa has become more prevalent in the DPRK this year.
					Institutions, industrial establishments, factories, farms, schools and all other units across the country supported the army with might and main. 
					
					People's delegations visited units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on the army day and shared warm feelings of kinship with soldiers, conveying them tidings from the rear and handing over aid goods permeated with the sincerity of the people to them.
					
					Ministries and national institutions including the Ministry of Post and Telecommunications, the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport, the Ministry of Extractive Industries and the Ministry of Chemical Industry sent aid goods helpful to military and political training and military service of the servicepersons to KPA units and the Songyo Knitting Factory, the Hamhung Wooden Ware Factory, the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Hospital and other units, lots of families and individual working people across the country devoted their patriotic ardor to aiding the army.
					
					KPA soldiers on their part displayed the noble manner of voluntarily doing good things for the people under the slogan "Let us help the people!" And they extended support, material and moral, to such main economic sectors as power, coal and metal industries and railway transport.
					
					KPA units provided nearby co-op farms with farming materials and spared no effort in helping them with workforce. Soldiers saved the lives and properties of people with self-sacrificing spirit, braving danger, when unexpected accidents happened in the areas where they are stationed. 
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will surely build a great, prosperous and powerful nation in this land with the might of single-minded unity, upholding the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il

articles.title: Indefatigable Leadership of Great Brilliant Commander over Army
articles.content:
Indefatigable Leadership of Great Brilliant Commander over Army
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The officers and men of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the people are looking back upon the feats that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed, giving an uninterrupted inspection to army units all the year round.
					His leadership over the army is manifested by the inspection to units of all services and arms which started from the inspection to a KPA unit honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment at the outset of the year.
					
					He called at a KPA sub-unit on a biting cold winter day where he with deep care looked after the military service and life of servicepersons, acquainting himself with any slightest inconvenience in their life, indoor temperature of the bedroom and others.
					
					Inspecting a company named after a hero, he inspired the company soldiers, saying that all of them should become heroes and while seeing round a health complex, a comprehensive service centre for soldiers, he set forth tasks and ways for managing it.
					
					When he saw data at an army unit on deeds for helping the people including the fact that soldiers saved the lives and property of people with a self-sacrificing spirit, he praised them as beautiful deeds that could be done only by the KPA.
					
					While inspecting the headquarters of combined units, he was satisfied with the fact that all the commanding officers and soldiers were not only constantly improving military technology and combat capacity but also discharging their guard duty in a manner of responsibility with a high degree of revolutionary vigilance and combat awareness and put forward important tasks that would serve as the guideline in strengthening the KPA into invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					In the course of inspection he met lots of soldiers including a non-commissioned officer in extra service who had served in a unit for 30-odd-years and expressed his deep trust in them, saying that having such steel-like invincible army, the socialist motherland was impregnable.
					
					After appreciating simple art performances of servicepersons and performances of art groups of servicepersons' families, he encouraged them to take the lead in the creation of culture commensurate with the Songun era.
					
					The leadership over the army he has continued till the last month of the year has adorned a brilliant page of the history as a long inspection journey of great devotion.

articles.title: Pyongyang Facelifted
articles.content:
Pyongyang Facelifted
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Audacious and bold projects have been undertaken in Pyongyang this year under the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea to add grandeur and beauty to it as a city of the people. 
					 Major service centers and cultural facilities of the capital city have been spruced up.
					
					 The Okryu and Chongryu Restaurants, public catering centers popular with the people, have been refurbished to combine national classical beauty with modern beauty while preserving its original looks and well harmonize grace, majesty and elaborateness while providing the best convenience to the customers.
					
					A good many people spend their pleasant hours at the Taedongmun Cinema which has been facelifted to be flawless in formative artistic respect and acoustic effect and the Central Zoo which has changed its looks to remind one of a "natural zoo". 
					
					 The banks of River Taedong meandering through Pyongyang have been largely lowered and reinforced between the Okryu Restaurant and the Chungsong Bridge and parks laid out along the banks. This gives a broader prospect of east Pyongyang across the rich stream of the river.
					
					 Various folk game fields, playgrounds, varied shapes of benches and open-air meal tables have cropped up and service facilities have appeared in the thickly wooded area and lawn along the banks of the Pothong River.
					
					 Lots of results have been achieved in sprucing up main streets so that they may be faultless to all appearance in the distant future.
					
					 The vast-scale reconstruction of Mansudae Street is in full swing and apartment houses of various architectural styles such as octagonal and semicircular ones began to show their outlines.
					
					 The main streets including Kaesonmun, Chilsongmun, Moranbong, Podnamu, Yongung and Chollima Streets and Changjon Crossroad have been newly asphalted. Meanwhile the outer walls of the buildings in the main streets have been dressed with tiles and a brisk work has been pushed on to render their surroundings more refreshing.
					
					 The citizens eager to turn Pyongyang into a city in a park have planted numerous trees of good species and laid out 200-odd new flower beds in the main streets this year.
					
					 The looks of Pyongyang renovated to meet the requirements of the new century heighten the pride of the citizens living in the revolutionary capital.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Will Have to Pay for All Their Crimes
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Will Have to Pay for All Their Crimes
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed commentary discloses the ulterior aim sought by the Lee Myung Bak group in deteriorating the inter-Korean relations in the first year of its office and the moves stepped up by them to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK this year.
					 The above-said confrontational maniacs will have to pay a dear price for their crimes, the commentary warns, and goes on:
					
					The Lee group are the traitors opposed to reunification as they negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and have hamstrung any effort to implement them. Their sinister intention is, needless to say, to scrap the north-south joint declarations and rush headlong into permanent division, confrontation and a war of aggression against the north, pursuant to their such "policy towards the north" as traitorous and anti-reunification watchword "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars." 
					
					 "Respect for the declarations," "dialogue" and "sincerity" touted by the Lee group are nothing but an empty talk and a mockery of the nation unless they clarify their will to totally revise "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" and respect the joint declarations and implement them.
					
					 They shut the door of inter-Korean dialogue by putting up unreasonable preconditions and declared "dialogue useless." This is no more than a premeditated and deliberate attempt to completely scuttle dialogue and cooperation undertakings between the north and south.
					
					 The puppet warmongers' madcap exercises for a war of aggression against the north prove that they are making a desperate bid to realize their sinister scenario to do harm and stifle the DPRK at any cost in league with their master, the U.S. imperialists.
					
					It admits of no argument that the Lee group are entirely to blame for driving the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe and the full responsibility for their deterioration rests with them.
					
					 With neither artifice nor sophism can they conceal the worst crime they have committed by pushing the inter-Korean relations to the crisis of total severance and throwing a stumbling block and hurdles in the way of national reconciliation, unity and reunification and evade the responsibility for it.
					
					 The Korean nation will keep tabs on the crimes committed by the Lee group by swimming against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification and force them to pay a dear price for them.

articles.title: GNP Clans Accused of Fanning up Confrontation and War Atmosphere
articles.content:
GNP Clans Accused of Fanning up Confrontation and War Atmosphere
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the "speaker of National Assembly" of south Korea together with heavyweights of the "Grand National Party" (GNP) visited a puppet army unit in the area along the Military Demarcation Line to fan up extreme confrontation and war atmosphere to provoke the north, crying out for "making full preparations to cope with the situation" and "cultivating mental power to make the army strong." 
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said reckless behavior of the GNP clans is nothing but a reckless act to increase the military tension on the Korean Peninsula and ignite a war of aggression against the north as it is a revelation of the extreme hostility toward the north and an attempt to escalate the confrontation with it. 
					
					 This year is recorded with the unpardonable crimes the traitors of the GNP have committed by making desperate efforts to step up the confrontation with fellow countrymen and the moves for a war of aggression against the north, going against the desire of the nation for the peace and reunification of the country, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The hysteria kicked up by confrontational maniacs and political gangsters to call for the "strengthened posture to cope with the situation" even by touring the above-said area is an unpardonable criminal act to fan up the belligerency of the puppet army and prod it to step up the preparations for a war.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations driven to catastrophe at present prove that the GNP's seizure of power brought the successes made in the June 15 era of reunification to naught and exacerbated the confrontation between the north and the south and, consequently, a war is bound to break out in the end.
					
					 It is urgent to mete out a stern punishment of history to the GNP as early as possible as it is keen to escalate the inter-Korean confrontation and the moves for a war of aggression against the north as a private party of traitor Lee Myung Bak. Otherwise, the whole nation and the whole land of Korea will not be able to escape a nuclear disaster.

articles.title: Aerial Espionage Committed against DPRK on Steady Increase This Year
articles.content:
Aerial Espionage Committed against DPRK on Steady Increase This Year
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- This year the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the war maniacs of the south Korean puppet armed forces have perpetrated a total of at least 2,200 cases of aerial espionage against the DPRK by massively mobilizing strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions, according to a military source.
					 In December, the U.S. imperialists committed at least 110 cases and the south Korean war maniacs more than 70 cases, at least 180 cases in total.
					
					 U-2 belonging to the warmongers of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces perpetrated more than 290 cases of aerial espionage, their RC-12 at least 500 cases and their RC-7B over 280 cases this year.
					
					 Their overseas-based RC-135, EP-3, E-3 and E-8C flew into the air above areas of south Korea periodically this year to spy on all areas of the DPRK.
					
					 The war maniacs of the south Korean puppet armed forces have become more frantic in their aerial espionage against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 Their RC-800 perpetrated at least 580 cases of aerial espionage while their RF-4C committed more than 170 cases this year.
					
					 These numbers and facts go to clearly prove how frantically and desperately the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the war mongers of the south Korean puppet armed forces have stepped up the preparations for a war of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: Struggle against GNP Starts in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against GNP Starts in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Political parties and civic and public organizations of south Korea, including the People's Emergency Action to Check Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Railroad Evil Bills, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society, the Council of Youth Organizations and the Democratic Labor Party, held a meeting in Seoul on Dec. 28 to vow the "48-hour people's emergency action to check Lee Myung Bak's moves to railroad evil bills against people's living and democracy."
					 At the meeting speakers said that people of various circles could not but turn out in the emergency action as the "Grand National Party" is seeking to railroad en masse the evil laws while ruling supreme at the "National Assembly."
					
					 If the evil bills are unilaterally passed, the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the GNP will face their own destruction and those kowtowing to the traitorous clique will be cursed and condemned by the popular masses, they warned.
					
					  They stated that they would show the resentment of the people through the struggles against the present regime and the traitorous political party, including a meeting of peasants and fishermen, a people's rally, a candlelight prayer meeting, a sit-in strike and an all-out meeting of press trade union with the start of a press conference for declaring the 48-hour people's emergency action.
					
					 A resolution read out at the meeting said that they would never pardon the GNP which is trying to railroad Lee Myung Bak's evil bills, brandishing the sword of dictatorship in disregard of the people.
					
					 At the end of the meeting a candlelight action of Internet users was launched to denounce the brigandish act of the traitorous political party.
					
					 Meanwhile, human rights organizations, including the Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations, called a press conference outside the building of the GNP on the same day in protest against its moves to railroad the evil bills.
					
					 In a press release the organizations declared that they would not remain a passive onlooker to the unreasonable behavior of the GNP seeking to railroad the evil bills aimed at violating human rights, but struggle against the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime on behalf of human rights.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Adopt Anti-Reunification Law Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Adopt Anti-Reunification Law Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 28 to assail Lee Myung Bak puppet group of traitors for working hard to cook up an anti-reunification law. 
					 Speakers at the press conference accused the Grand National Party of south Korea of bringing "a bill on human rights issue in the north" for discussion at the "National Assembly," adding that this is part of the criminal actions to bring the deteriorated inter-Korean relations to a total collapse. 
					
					 A press release read out at the press conference said that the contents of the above-said bill help see through the sinister intention of Lee and the GNP to drive the inter-Korean relations into severance. 
					
					 The press release held that with no artifice can the GNP justify its treacherous moves to stifle the DPRK under the signboard of "human rights."
					
					 It demanded Lee and the GNP drop their attempts to railroad the deceptive "bill on human rights issue in the north" as it makes a mockery of the south Korean people and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Make Retrogressive Revision of Law on Media Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Make Retrogressive Revision of Law on Media Assailed
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Personages of media, academic, judicial, religious and other circles held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 28 denouncing traitor Lee Myung Bak group's moves to make a retrogressive revision of the law on media, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 They charged that bills on the revision of the law on media including a "bill on the revision of the law on newspapers" and a "bill on the revision of the law on broadcasting" and others which the Lee "government" and the "Grand National Party" seek to railroad are nothing but evil bills designed to shake the democracy of society and the unbiased public opinion to their very foundations.
					
					 They urged the GNP to immediately stop its moves to railroad the said bills through the "National Assembly."
					
					 They declared that they would positively support the strike of members of the media trade union and struggle in solidarity with the civic and public organizations to check the GNP's above-said moves. 
					
					 The south Korean Press Trade Union held a rally to kick off the action for checking the authorities' moves to make a retrogressive revision of the law on media outside the building of the NA in Seoul on Dec. 26 and declared the start of an all-out struggle. 
					
					 Speakers at the rally stated that the GNP's moves brought to light the design of the Lee group to put media under its control as they are aimed at leaving media to the tender mercy of the big businesses and conservative newspapers.
					
					 A resolution read out at the rally declared that they would surely frustrate the GNP's moves and threatened to immediately launch a struggle to force the regime to step down in case the bills on the revision of the law on media is rammed through the NA.

articles.title: 48-Hour People's Emergency Action Staged in Seoul
articles.content:
48-Hour People's Emergency Action Staged in Seoul
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea launched a "48-hour people's emergency action to check Lee Myung Bak's moves to railroad evil bills against people's living and democracy" in Seoul on Dec. 29.
					 The above-said action organization made up of more than 100 civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea and the Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations called a news conference in front of the Kukmin Bank near the "National Assembly" building in Youido to declare the start of the "48-hour people's emergency action."
					
					 At the news conference the organization termed the evil bill introduced by Lee a declaration of war against the people, declaring that the motion calling for the ratification of south Korea-U.S. FTA, the bill on the revision of the law on broadcasting, the bill on the revision of the law on protecting the secret of communication, the bill on the revision of the law on assembly and demonstration and the "bill on the human rights issue in the north" should never be allowed to pass through the NA.
					
					 If the "government" and the ruling party railroad lots of unpopular evil bills, the organization will label them "bills for dictatorship" and immediately launch a struggle to judge the Lee Myung Bak regime, the organization warned.
					
					 At the end of the news conference, organizations grouping people of different circles staged protests in various parts of Seoul. 
					
					 The above-said people's action was followed by a "candlelight prayers meeting" sponsored by the Pastorate Council for Realizing Justice and Peace of south Korea. 
					
					 The participants offered strong resistance against the riot police.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Railroad Evil Laws Refuted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Railroad Evil Laws Refuted
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Members of the Democratic Labor Party, an opposition party of south Korea, called a press conference in front of "Chongwadae" in Seoul on Dec. 26 to denounce Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to railroad unpopular evil laws.
					 At the press conference speakers accused the "government" and the "Grand National Party" of turning the "National Assembly" into a "battle field" while making desperate efforts to railroad the "Lee Myung Bak's evil laws" at any cost.
					
					 For Lee Myung Bak to promise to not make one-man show any longer, owning the responsibility for all the developments, is the only way to put the NA on a normal track, they held. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that Lee is outwardly talking about "mutual understanding" but, in actuality, has fixed even the date to pass the "Lee Myung Bak's evil law," they deplored that it is hard to live under the same sky with Lee Myung Bak keen to stay in office permanently. 
					
					 A press released read out at the press conference warned they would continue their struggle until the "government" and the ruling party have stopped their moves to institute the said evil laws.

articles.title: Moves to Railroad "Motion Calling for Ratification of FTA" Rebuffed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Moves to Railroad "Motion Calling for Ratification of FTA" Rebuffed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement, the Lawmakers' Council to Cope with the Emergency Situation Opposed to the Hasty Ratification of the south Korea-U.S. FTA and other organizations of south Korea called a joint press conference at the "National Assembly" building on Dec. 26 at which they denounced the moves of the "Grand National Party" to railroad the "motion calling for the ratification of the south Korea-U.S. FTA" through it.
					 Speakers at the press conference accused the GNP of making haste to clear the said motion within the year, warning that if the GNP concludes the "agreement," seized with sycophancy, it will only touch off stronger distrust and resistance among the people.
					
					 Then a press release was read out. It stressed the need to fundamentally reexamine all the "trade policies" including the conclusion of the FTA with the U.S.

articles.title: 2nd Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Held in China
articles.content:
2nd Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Held in China
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The 2nd Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show was held in Hunchun from Dec. 17 to 20 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					 Potted Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias in full bloom in the venue of the show presented fantastic scenery. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were figures from all walks of life and people and Koreans in Hunchun City and Yanji City. Present there on invitation were the consul general and staff members of the Consulate General of the DPRK in Shenyang. 
					
					 Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun of China, and other speakers at the ceremony expressed belief that the show opened to observe the significant day would mark an important opportunity of boosting the Sino-DPRK friendship. Noting that the world people's response to the said flowers is becoming livelier as the days go by, they added that this is humankind's manifestation of profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Significant Day of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Significant Day of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Brazil and Austria and a seminar, a book and photo exhibition and a film show in Thailand between Dec. 13 and 16 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were works of the peerlessly great men and books and photos showing their revolutionary feats.
					
					 Marco Campanela, general secretary of the Brasilia Federal District Committee of the Brazilian Democratic Movement said in his speech that Korean socialism established by President Kim Il Sung has been firmly defended by dint of the unique Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Erich Zavadil, chairman of the Advisory Council of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, in his speech said that the army and people of the DPRK have performed feats in defending socialism and building a great prosperous powerful nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, said in a speech that the unique Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il to cope with the changed international environment and the acute situation is the most perfect mode of politics as it makes it possible to reliably defend Korean socialism and push forward the socialist cause despite the severe trials and difficulties.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched Korean film "75th Founding Anniversary of Heroic Korean People's Army."
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events held in Austria and Thailand.

articles.title: Dismantlement of Concrete Wall Demanded
articles.content:
Dismantlement of Concrete Wall Demanded
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The chairperson of the Mahlambandlophy, Pretoria City, Branch of the African National Congress of South Africa issued a statement on Dec. 23 in demand of removal of the concrete wall.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Many years have passed since the end of the Cold War, but there still remains in the Korean Peninsula the concrete wall dividing the homogenous nation into two. This is an intolerable challenge and mockery of the progressive humankind standing against aggression and war and aspiring after peace and democracy.
					
					 The said huge physical wall dividing Korea into the north and the south is a product of the intrinsic nature and tactics of the imperialists seeking to dominate other countries by means of disunion and the treacherous crime of the despicable separatist forces kowtowing to the imperialists.
					
					 It is entirely attributable to the U.S. troops' occupation of south Korea that the division of Korea has lasted for more than six decades and the physical wall has existed for nearly three decades without any restriction.
					
					 The statement called upon the peace organizations and progressive humankind of the world to conduct a worldwide struggle for getting the U.S. aggressor forces withdrawn from south Korea and the concrete wall, a symbol of the national division, pulled down.

articles.title: Film Shows Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Film Shows Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place in the Czech Republic, Russia, Laos, Germany and Romania between Dec. 13 and 19 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					The participants in the shows watched "75th Founding Anniversary of Heroic Korean People's Army" and other Korean films.
					
					 The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said at a film show that under the guidance of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il the KPA has been prepared as the matchless invincible army capable of defeating any formidable enemy and the DPRK has turned into an indestructible socialist power.
					
					 The general director of a Russian company said that through the film show they came to know well about the ardent mind of the Korean people absolutely trusting and following their leader.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the film show held in the Czech Republic.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Lauded in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Lauded in Austria
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna published its bulletin carrying the portraits of the three generals of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 91st birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero.
					 The bulletin told about Kim Jong Suk who safeguarded President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life in hard-fought battles.
					
					It also dealt with the facts that she unconditionally and perfectly carried out the orders and instructions given by Kim Il Sung and, after the liberation of Korea, devoted her all to the cause of building the party, the army and the state.
					
					 She is a revolutionary fighter and an anti-Japanese war hero who dedicated all her life to the liberation of Korea and the victory of revolution, the bulletin stressed.
					
					 It said that she still remains alive in the hearts of the Korean people as the most loyal revolutionary comrade-in-arms of Kim Il Sung, anti-Japanese war hero, admirable politician and mother of Juche Korea.

articles.title: Tribute to Kim Il Sung Paid by Int'l Organization
articles.content:
Tribute to Kim Il Sung Paid by Int'l Organization
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America held an event of laying a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President
					Kim Il Sung on Dec. 26 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Present there were Alfonso Fraga Perez, secretary general of the organization, and its members and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid the basket of flowers before the portrait of the smiling President and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il junto con Kim Yong Nam felicita a Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il junto con Kim Yong Nam felicita a Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea,  envio el dia 31 junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Yong Nam, un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Segundo Secretario del CC del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					Con motivo de conmemorarse el 50o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, enviamos en nombre del PTC, el gobierno de la RPDC y del pueblo coreano nuestras calidas felicitaciones y saludo camaraderil a Vd. y, por su conducto, al PCC, al gobierno de la Republica de Cuba y al pueblo cubano, comienza la misiva y prosigue:
					
					Durante los 50 anos pasados desde el triunfo de la revolucion, bajo la correcta direccion del estimado companero Fidel Castro y de Vd., el hermano pueblo cubano defendio honrosamente la soberania del pais frustrando las maniobras de sancion, bloqueo, aislamiento y aplastamiento de los imperialistas y logro grandes avances en las labores para la educacion, la salud publica, el desarrollo economico y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					El pueblo coreano se regocija siempre de todos los exitos logrados por el hermano pueblo cubano en la revolucion y la construccion considerandolos como los suyos y brindara en el futuro tambien el firme apoyo y solidaridad a la justa causa de su pueblo para defender la soberania del pais y las conquistas de la revolucion.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, manifestamos nuestra conviccion de que las tradicionales y camaraderiles relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los partidos, los gobiernos y los pueblos de nuestros dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran incesantemente en la lucha comun contra el imperialismo y por el socialismo y formulamos sinceros votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos de Vd. y su pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia cesto de flores a la embajada cubana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia cesto de flores a la embajada cubana
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio un cesto de flores a la Embajada de la Republica de Cuba en Corea con motivo del 50o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana.
					El cesto de flores fue entregado el dia 31 al embajador cubano Jose Manuel Galego Montano.

articles.title: MINREX condena el bombardeo israeli contra Palestina
articles.content:
MINREX condena el bombardeo israeli contra Palestina
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea, formulada en relacion con el reciente ataque militar de gran envergadura de Israel contra Palestina, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 30 como sigue:
					 El dia 27, Israel lanzo un barbaro ataque aereo sobre la franja de Gaza de Palestina movilizando mas de 60 cazas y helicopteros armados.
					
					 Como resultado, mas de 900 civiles pacificos resultaron muertos o lesionados y se destruyeron numerosos edificios publicos y viviendas.
					
					 Condenamos categoricamente las atrocidades de homicidio de Israel contra los civiles inermes calificandolas de crimenes antieticos, grave acto provocativo contra el pueblo palestino y los otros arabes y abierto desafio al proceso de paz del Medio Oriente.
					
					 Israel debe suspender de inmediato todas sus acciones militares y aceptar las demandas del pueblo arabe y los demas del mundo para la solucion comprensiva e imparcial del problema del Medio Oriente.

articles.title: Se reportan este ano mas de 2200 casos de espionaje aereo contra RPDC
articles.content:
Se reportan este ano mas de 2200 casos de espionaje aereo contra RPDC
 Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Segun fuentes militares, este ano, las tropas norteamericanas y los belicistas del ejercito titere del Sur de Corea cometieron en mas de 2 mil 200 ocasiones el espionaje aereo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea movilizando los aviones estrategicos y tacticos de diferentes misiones.
					 Solo en diciembre, estos casos se totalizaron en mas de 180, especificamente, mas de 110 por parte de los primeros y mas de 70 por los segundos.
					
					 En particular, el "U-2" de las tropas norteamericanas cumplio este ano la misma mision mas de 290 veces mientras "RC-12" y "RC-7B" lo hicieron mas de 500 y mas de 280 veces, respectivamente.
					
					 EE.UU. traslado periodicamente desde su base aerea en ultramar al firmamento surcoreano los aviones "RC-135", "EP-3", "E-3" y "E-8C" para espiar toda la extension de la RPDC.
					
					 Por su parte, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos recrudecieron esta operacion militar contra la RPDC en contubernio con EE.UU.
					
					 Sobre todo, "RC-800" y "RF-4C" la realizaron este ano en mas de 580 y en mas de 170 veces, respectivamente.
					
					 Estas cifras y hechos demuestran cuan obstinados son los preparativos de los agresores norteamericanos y los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano para lanzar una guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
